title: You
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Feels like walking death
Nothing's wrong, I just can't go on
You think everything
Falls in place so easily
[Chorus]
It's you
Make it easy 'cause you love me
You
Make it easy 'cause you love me
[Verse 2]
Isn't any words
To convey everything I feel
I think you were the one
Brought me here holding on
[Chorus]
It's you
Make it easy 'cause you love me
You
Make it easy 'cause you love me
[Verse 3]
Every whisper says goodnight
Oh, when you tell me I was right
I'm ready to find you

[Chorus]
It's you
Make it easy 'cause you love me
You
Make it easy 'cause you love me
[Verse 4]
Oh, when you tell me I was right, oh no
I'm ready to go and I'm ready to show you how I feel
I'm here and I was listening
Something's wrong
I know you want me back, but you were missing
You weren't mine
[Chorus]
It's you
Make it easy 'cause you love me
You
Make it easy 'cause you love me
You
You
Da-da-da
